result.execSummary: Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Clerk: Kimberly
Case Called: 8:59am
INCLUDES 14CF703, 15CF257, 16CM352
State appears by ADA Chad Minder and ADA Michael Puerner.  Deft appears in person, in custody, with Atty Rodman Streicher.  

Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed.  VRCW.
State moves to:
14CF703:
Amend Ct. 1 1st-degree recklessly endangering safety- use of dangerous weapon to delete "use of dangerous weapon" enhancer
Ct. 2 Substantial battery-intend bodily harm- use of dangerous weapon >> D&RI
Ct. 2 Felon Possess Firearm >> D&RI
Ct. 4 Intentionally Point Firearm at person >> D&RI
Ct. 5 Intimidate witness/person charged/felony- solicitation>> D&RI
15CF257:
Ct. 1 Intimidate witness/person charged/felony- solicitation of >> was consolidated into 14CF703 therefore file is dismissed
16CM352:
Ct. 1 Disorderly conduct >> D&RI
COURT grants above

PLEA: 
14CF703:
Amended Ct. 1 1st-degree recklessly endangering safety >> NO CONTEST

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty. 
COURT ORDERS: 12 years WSPS - 7 years IC, 5 years ES. 559 days credit granted. CONDITONS OF ES: Complete any assessment, treatment, or counseling deemed necessary by agent. Pay CC. PAy DNA sample and surcharge. No contact with R.F. No restitution requested. Deft is eligible for both prison programming- Challenge Incareration Program & Susbtance Abuse Program.

Deft is remanded to MC Sheriff's Dept to be transported to Dodge Prison
